def_cn: （在某处）等待，闲逛，闲呆着
def_en: If you hang around, hang about, or hang round, you stay in the same place doing nothing, usually because you are waiting for something or someone.

def_cn: 经常和…在一起;经常泡在
def_en: If you hang around ,hang about, or hang round with someone or in a particular place, you spend a lot of time with that person or in that place.
